description: This file is a shell script used for managing mTLS (mutual TLS) credentials, logging, and related certificate operations. It includes functions for obtaining credentials based on various conditions, logging errors or information, and sourcing configuration files.

methods.name: tlsLog
methods.description: Logs messages with a timestamp to the tlsError.log file.

methods.name: getMtlsCreds
methods.description: Retrieves and constructs mTLS credentials based on device configuration and certificate files.
